com.foreach.across.modules.hibernate.jpa.repositories

Interface CommonJpaRepository<T,U extends Serializable>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<T,U>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<T,U>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<T>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<T,U>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<T>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<T,U>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IdBasedEntityJpaRepository<T>

    public interface CommonJpaRepository<T,U extends Serializable>
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<T,U>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaSpecificationExecutor<T>
    Shortcut interface combining the default JpaRepository with a JpaSpecificationExecutor.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Method Summary
